name: Ruins of Xun'Sha Caravan
description: Found just inside the ruins area.

name: Last Refuge Caravan
description: Inside the Last Refuge area near the entrance.

name: Animal Trainer
description: AlthrasInside the Last Refuge near the Animal Pens.

name: Horse Breeder
description: BertrandInside the Last Refuge by the Stables.

name: Thrall Merchant
description: Zeina The VixenSells Relic Hunter Thralls.

name: Coin Exchange
description:
Met-su-khons: Silver for Bronze
Takarut: Gold for Bronze

name: Pearls for Rare Items
description: Shamalla, The Pirate Queen & Weeba Shamrock

name: Rusted Key
description: Up up up for a rusted key!

name: Black Blood Tools
description:
Kill the Elite Child of Jhil

Randomly drops:
  • Black Blood Skinning Knife
  • Black Blood Hatchet
  • Black Blood Sickle

name: Underwater Temple
description: Dive down down down inside the round ruin to an underwater ruined temple area with many chests!

name: Hidden Stash
description:
Hidden behind 11 sliding doors. Need the rusted key from the body in the upper platform of the south tower.

1. Supply Materials
2. Fragment of Power
3. Rare Materials
4, Legendary Items
5. Legendary Tool
6. Bile
7. Legenday Armor Recipe
8. Star Metal Ore
9. Eldarium
10. Legendary Weapon
11. Lotus Seeds

name: Werewolf
description: Drops Flesh of Remebrance and Shadebloom

name: Portal to the Witch Queen's Lair
Secret Stash
description: Click on the Lemurian Lion statue at the edge of the platform to move it backwards and loot three hidden chests.

name: Black Blood Pick
description: Inside the Crystal Cave on the left.

name: Gravedigger
description: Leaning against the large wooden crate.

name: There is Something Seriously Wrong With You...
Black Blood Tools
description:
Kill the Elite Child of Jhil

Randomly drops:
  • Black Blood Skinning Knife
  • Black Blood Hatchet
  • Black Blood Sickle
  • and Black Blood Pick

name: Rusted Key
description: Up up up for a rusted key!

name: Enter the grate if you dare...
Collapsed Mine
description: Skellie spawnsRipping Great Axe on a crate on the way inMind the fog...

name: Underwater Breathing Mask
description: On a table near the bonfire.

name: Message in a Bottle
description: Language Dictionary (Tongue of the Serpent Men)

name: Sand Reaper Egg
description: Inside the Reaper Nests (looks like a dragon egg).

name: Scorpion Eggs
description: Gathered from the corpse of the Scorpion Queen.

name: Pet Eggs
description: Found on Menagerie Keepers, dropped at random.Rocknose Eggs, Spider Egg Sacs, Shoebill Eggs

name: Komodo Hatchlings
description: Inside the swamp area of the Ruins of Xun'Sha.

name: Grandmaster Armorsmith
description: At the very top of the Queen's Tomb by the well entrance.

name: Silent Legion Armor & Kinscourge Weapons
description: Learned by touching the sword in the stone.

name: Convergence Trap
description: At bottom of hidden dungeon at Ruined Abode.

name: Grandmaster Weaponsmith & Eldarium Tools
description: In the last room of the Atlantean Tomb.

name: Lemurian Sword
description: Swim to the very bottom of the round ruin.

name: Frost Smithing
description: Inside Rimfrost Grotto next to Frost Forge.

name: Specialist Ammunition IV
description: Kill the Elite Child of Jhil.

name: Reptile Leather Epic
description: Inside Last Words Cavern at the end of a jumping puzzle to cross the floating wreckage.

name: Delving Bench
description: Just inside the Ruins of Xun'Sha area at the caravan.

name: Ancient Lemurian Wraps & Aloe Extract
description: Inside underwater cave.Also check the scroll pile at the end of the table for a random emotes scroll!

name: Library of Esoteric Artifacts
description: Once learned, spend Fragments of Power to learn a random recipe.

name: Dragonbone Armor & Weapons
description: At the very end of the Old Mines behind the Undead Dragon.

name: Serpent-Man Weapons
description: Deep down in the hole at the very back of Crystal Cave.

name: Weapon Oils
description: Inside the Queen's Tomb by her feet.

name: Vanquisher of the King Beneath
description: Kill the King Beneath and loot the scroll and golden key.

name: Derketo
description: Speak to the Yakira, Priestess of Derketo.

name: Zath
description: Inside, on the left, on top of the cabinet, is a small Zath shrine. Touch it for the key to the door behind the counter. Head inside the cave, down to where the large Zath shrine is toppled over, and the book is on top of the altar pillar nearest the snacking black widow.

name: Jester's Notebook
description: At the very back of Last Words Cavern.

name: Scroll Pile
description: Inside underwater cave. Gives a random emote scroll.

name: Thrall Emote: Threaten (Unavailable!)
description: These were live in testing and removed before released, may return at a later date!(Threaten)

name: Pet Emotes: Sift, Howl, Ambush (Unavailable!)
description: These were live in testing and removed before released, may return at a later date!(Sift, Howl, Ambush, etc)

name: Elite Child of Jhil
description: Randomly drops Unwelcome Gift, Act of Violence.

name: Elite Undead
description: A random undead boss, ranging from skeletal slayers, He-Who-Walks-Below, and various other strong undead creatures.

name: Elite Child of Jhil
description: Randomly drops Black Blood Skinning Knife, Black Blood Hatchet, Black Blood Sickle, and Black Blood Pick.

name: The Atlantean King
description: In the last room of the Atlantean Tomb.

name: The King Beneath
description: Drops the Scroll for Vanquisher of the King Beneath and the Golden Key to open the interior of the dungeon.

name: The Brute
description: At the very end of Broken Bones Cavern.

name: Elite Child of Jhil
description: Randomly drops Unwelcome Gift, Act of Violence.

name: Undead Dragon
description: At the end of the Old Mines.

name: Elite Child of Jhil
description: Drops Skeleton Key, Fragment of Power, and Scroll: Specialist Ammunition IV.

name: Imp King
description: Jump down the well in Vargrheim!

name: Ouroboros
description: Entry is inside the Serpentmen temple at the very bottom of the Crystal Cave
